prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Bass, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Bass, and Guitar, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Bass, and Guitar, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
This piece has Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Bass, and Guitar, but Piano is not part of it.
